dashboard.title: Overview
dashboard.subtitle: Track your automation performance in real-time.

automations.empty_desc: Create your first automation to start replying to comments automatically.
automations.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this automation?

wizard.title: New Automation
wizard.subtitle: Create a new automation workflow
wizard.gate_desc: Only send rewards to users who follow you.
wizard.step_1_desc: Choose the event that triggers this flow.

scheduler.title: Post Scheduler
scheduler.subtitle: Plan your content logic across formats.
scheduler.automation_helper: The selected flow will be triggered by keywords in comments.
scheduler.empty_desc: Drag a video above to schedule your first post!

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your application preferences and safety controls.
settings.appearance_desc: Customize how FluxDM looks and feels.
settings.data_desc: Export your data or manage system state.

connect_social.title: Connect Social
connect_social.description: Connect your social media accounts to enable automation.
connect_social.disclaimer: This will open a browser window to authorize FluxDM. We require permissions to manage messages and comments.

troubleshooting.title: Don't see your Instagram account?
troubleshooting.step2: 2. Go to Edit Profile > Public Business Info.
troubleshooting.step3: 3. Tap Page and connect an existing Facebook Page or create a new one.
troubleshooting.step4: 4. Come back here and try logging in again.

developer_settings.title: Developer Settings & Custom API Key
developer_settings.subtitle: Custom Meta App Config
developer_settings.description: Use your own Meta App ID and Secret for full control. Leave blank to use default FluxDM keys.
developer_settings.how_to_title: How to get your own Keys
developer_settings.how_to_desc: Watch this tutorial to learn how to create a Meta App and get your App ID & Secret.

connect_social.error_browser: You are in Browser Mode. Please open the FluxDM Desktop App to connect.
connect_social.disconnect_confirm: Are you sure you want to disconnect this account?

sidebar.select_date: Select a date on the calendar to schedule.
sidebar.no_automations: No automations found. Create one in the Builder!

automation.visual_warning: This is a Visual Flow. Please use the Visual Builder for complex edits.
automation.visual_warning_desc: Only metadata (Name/Trigger) can be edited here.
